com.vector.cfg.dom.com.model.groovy

Interface ICommunicationApi


  • @PublishedApi(value=ADDITIONS_ALLOWED)
 @PublishedApiDomain(value=AUTOMATION_IF)
public interface ICommunicationApi
    ICommunicationApi provides high convenience support for communication related use cases.
    ICommunicationApi provides high convenience support for communication related use cases.
